title: Zucchini Spaghetti
directions: Use a spiralizer to turn the zucchini into "noodles."

No spiralizer? No problem. Cut a thin slice off the bottom of the zucchini (lengthwise) to keep it from rolling around on the cutting board. Place the zucchini flat-side down and, using a julienne peeler or a mandolin slicer, cut the zucchini into "noodles."

In a large skillet, heat coconut oil over medium-high heat. Add the "noodles" to the skillet and cook, turning a few times, until hot. (This will only take about a couple minutes.) Season with sea salt and pepper.
ingredients: 2 tsp. coconut oil, raw, extra-virgin, organic
sea salt, unrefined, & fresh ground pepper, organic to taste
